name: Priya Sharma
text: I was worried about veggies. MiniMealHub hides them so well! Tiffins come back empty every day.

name: David Chen
text: The convenience is a lifesaver. Fresh food, mild taste, perfect for nursery kids.

name: Sarah Jones
text: Paratha Treat Fridays are my son’s favorite. Safe, healthy and tasty.
